content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. What is your name, please?
Thank you, George. Could you please provide the address where you need our electrical services?
Thank you. Please hold while I check if your address is within our service area.
I’m having trouble verifying if your address is within our service area. Let me get a human specialist to assist you.
reason: AI unable to determine service area eligibility.

content: Hi George, this is Judy with XYZ Home Services. Unfortunately, 1878 Crestwood Lane in Fairview is just outside of our current service area. I’m really sorry we can’t assist with your electrical needs at this time. If you have another property closer to our covered regions, please let us know!
reason: Address outside service area. Operator notified customer.
